evidence: New research found that Canis dirus, popularly known as the dire wolf after making an appearance as a mythical creature in “Game of Thrones,” were found to have little in common with the gray wolves found in North America today, breaking with previous assumptions that they were just larger, bulkier versions of the modern wolf.
